name: Ultimate Minimal Interfase
description: this style containes: - Ultimate Minimal Tabs *shows always a close button on mouse-over *tabs are smaller *tab are longer on mouse-over *no tab overflow -URL bar in TAB bar *makes it possible to put your URL bar in the TAB bar -Auto-hide bookmarks toolbar -Big new tab button (necessary to make 'autohide bookmarks tookbar' work properly) p.s.: go to https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-do-i-customize-toolbars to see how you can customize the tool-bars.
